name: Canvas​Capability

fields.name: description
fields.description: A description of the canvas app. The maximum size is 255

fields.name: developerName
fields.description: The API name (developer name) of the connected app.

fields.name: height
fields.description: The height of the canvas app in pixels.

fields.name: icon
fields.description: The icon for the canvas app.

fields.name: namespacePrefix
fields.description: A unique namespace prefix for the canvas app.

fields.name: parameters
fields.description: JSON parameters passed to the canvas app.

fields.name: thumbnailUrl
fields.description: A thumbnail URL to a preview image. The maximum thumbnail size is 120

fields.name: title
fields.description: A title for the canvas link.

description: If a feed element has this capability, it renders a canvas app.
